snippet.title: Yohane the Parhelion: BLAZE in the DEEPBLUE - Debut Trailer
snippet.description:
Yohane challenges an underwater labyrinth!
"Yohane the Parhelion" is getting a 2D action game!
Official site: http://yohane-bid.com/

"Yohane the Parhelion" is an official spin-off of "Love Live! Sunshine".  "Yohane the Parhelion: BLAZE in the DEEPBLUE" is a 2D action game set in that fantasy world.

The player takes control of Yohane as she ventures into a mysterious dungeon alongside her partner Lailaps. She must challenge the monster-infested labyrinth to rescue her missing friends.

As Yohane crafts new equipment from the items she finds and gains the power of her comrades, she'll be able to explore more and more of the dungeon.

Parts of the dungeon will have randomized layouts, making for a hack & slash action game that stays fresh each time you play it.


Product Information
Title: Yohane the Parhelion: BLAZE in the DEEPBLUE
Platforms: Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Steam(PC)
Genre: Action
Rating: Pending
Players: 1
Release Date: November 16th, 2023
Price: TBD


©PROJECT YOHANE
©INTI CREATES CO., LTD.
©HAPPINET
